user_command: Dmitriy : Make the living room look redonkulous!
preference_query: Based on this command, infer what preference-related query should be used for retrieval: Dmitriy : Make the living room look redonkulous!
user_preferences: It seems that you enjoy a vibrant and lively atmosphere, as indicated by your previous command to match your bedroom lights to the sunny weather. To make the living room look "redonkulous," I suggest using bright and bold colors for the lighting, perhaps a mix of vibrant reds, purples, and blues. You could also consider adding some fun decorations or playful elements to enhance the overall vibe. If you have any specific ideas in mind or need further suggestions, feel free to share!
